title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Busy cursor not shown during checkbox update
description: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Busy cursor not shown during checkbox update
OB: It takes a long time (30 sec in my case) to update the checked state of the table. A busy cursor should be displayed during this process.
EB: A busy cursor should be shown during the update of the checkboxes.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the workspace with many projects
2. Click on Export Zip
3. Select all projects
4. Choose file types
5. Click OK
